description:
FFilecoin Orbit Uganda is a community-driven initiative dedicated to creating awareness and adoption of the Filecoin ecosystem through events, workshops, and developer onboarding programs. We focus on equipping students, developers, and local tech communities with practical knowledge of decentralized storage, the Filecoin Virtual Machine (FVM), and real-world blockchain applications
Since November 2024, we have hosted 6+ impactful events, including a Hackathon, Campus Tour, University Meetups, and Community Workshops, reaching students, developers, and local tech communities.
end_user:
Our project has significantly contributed to expanding awareness and education around decentralized storage and the Filecoin Virtual Machine (FVM) across universities in Uganda.
We hosted multiple university meetups introducing students to decentralized storage on Filecoin and how to build with FVM, attracting over 102 students and reaching nearly 1,000 impressions on X (Twitter).
Through our FVM Campus Tour across three universities, over 200 students explored how to build decentralized applications (DApps) and deploy smart contracts on FVM. The tour culminated in an FVM Hack Day, where students applied their knowledge in practical projects. Two standout projects emerged PhoLife https://github.com/sam-thetutor/PhoLife
 and Raoster raoster-hosted-1w1kf7kmr-olisehgenesis-projects.vercel.app
Additionally, we organized an IPFS workshop with hands-on demos on deploying sites and storing data on Filecoin, engaging 42+ participants.

Recognizing the growing interest in AI, we also hosted an AI and Decentralized Storage meetup, followed by an AI Agents Workshop, bringing together 45+ developers to learn how to build AI agents powered by Filecoin.
The end users that have benefited are Students, developers, and local tech communities thata  gained hands on experience with decentralized technologies and opportunities to innovate using Filecoin and FVM.
impressions: Our social media content has received over 4000 impressions
graduations_or_event_attendees: We had a total 400 attendees attend my events since November 2024-September
